summary: With his trade-mark fez and bumbling stage persona involving clever conjuring tricks which appear to have gone wrong Tommy Cooper is one of Britain's most popular comedians, respected by ... See full summary »
cast: David Threlfall|Helen McCrory|Amanda Redman|Gregor Fisher|Andy Rush|Paul Ritter|Bob Golding|Jordan Metcalfe|Jason Manford|Albie Marber|Charlotte Beaumont|Lucy Conley|Tilly Vosburgh|David Sterne|Marene Miller|Chris Ryman|John Biggins|Michael Müller|Andrew Harrison|Jacinta Mulcahy|Phil Yarrow|David Doyle|James Carcaterra|Hamish Hamilton|Hayley Collett|Pamela Betsy Cooper|Chris Cowlin|Ricardo Freitas|Kevin Hudson|Sam Shoubber
title: Tommy Cooper: Not Like That, Like This
